verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> there was a feast <S%G1859><s%> of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> there is in Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> by the sheep <S%G4262><s%> [gate] a pool, <S%G2861><s%> which is called <S%G1951><s%> in Hebrew <S%G1447><s%> Bethesda, <S%G964><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> porticoes. <S%G4745><s%>

In these <S%G3778><s%> lay <S%G2621><s%> a multitude <S%G4128><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who were sick, <S%G770><s%> blind, <S%G5185><s%> lame, <S%G5560><s%> and withered, <S%G3584><s%> [waiting <S%G1551><s%> for the moving <S%G2796><s%> of the waters; <S%G5204><s%>

for an angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> went <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> at certain <S%G2596><s%> seasons <S%G2540><s%> into the pool, <S%G2861><s%> and stirred <S%G5015><s%> up the water; <S%G5204><s%> whoever then <S%G3767><s%> first, <S%G4413><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the stirring <S%G5016><s%> up of the water, <S%G5204><s%> stepped <S%G1684><s%> in was made <S%G1096><s%> well <S%G5199><s%> from whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1221><s%> disease <S%G3553><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> he was afflicted. <S%G2722><s%>]
And a certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G444><s%> was there, <S%G1563><s%> who had been <S%G2192><s%> thirty-eight years <S%G2094><s%> in his sickness. <S%G769><s%>

When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> him lying <S%G2621><s%> there, and knew <S%G1097><s%> that he had already <S%G2235><s%> been <S%G2192><s%> a long <S%G4183><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> [in that condition,] He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Do you wish <S%G2309><s%> to get <S%G1096><s%> well <S%G5199><s%>?"

The sick <S%G770><s%> man answered <S%G611><s%> Him, "Sir, <S%G2962><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> man <S%G444><s%> to put <S%G906><s%> me into the pool <S%G2861><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%> is stirred <S%G5015><s%> up, but while <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I am coming, <S%G2064><s%> another <S%G243><s%> steps <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> me."
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Arise, <S%G1453><s%> take <S%G142><s%> up your pallet, <S%G2895><s%> and walk. <S%G4043><s%>"

And immediately <S%G2112><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> well, <S%G5199><s%> and took <S%G142><s%> up his pallet <S%G2895><s%> and [began] to walk. <S%G4043><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> it was the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> on that day. <S%G2250><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> were saying <S%G3004><s%> to him who was cured, <S%G2323><s%> "It is the Sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> and it is not permissible <S%G1832><s%> for you to carry <S%G142><s%> your pallet. <S%G2895><s%>"

But he answered <S%G611><s%> them, "He who made <S%G4160><s%> me well <S%G5199><s%> was the one <S%G1565><s%> who said <S%G3004><s%> to me, 'Take <S%G142><s%> up your pallet <S%G2895><s%> and walk. <S%G4043><s%>'"
They asked <S%G2065><s%> him, "Who <S%G5101><s%> is the man <S%G444><s%> who said <S%G3004><s%> to you, 'Take <S%G142><s%> up [your pallet,] and walk <S%G4043><s%>' ?"

But he who was healed <S%G2390><s%> did not know <S%G3609><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> it was; for Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had slipped <S%G1593><s%> away <S%G1593><s%> while there was a crowd <S%G3793><s%> in [that] place. <S%G5117><s%>

Afterward <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3778><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> him in the temple, <S%G2413><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Behold, <S%G2396><s%> you have become <S%G1096><s%> well; <S%G5199><s%> do not sin <S%G264><s%> anymore, <S%G3371><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that nothing <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5100><s%> worse <S%G5501><s%> may befall <S%G1096><s%> you."
The man <S%G444><s%> went <S%G565><s%> away, <S%G565><s%> and told <S%G3004><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> that it was Jesus <S%G2424><s%> who had made <S%G4160><s%> him well. <S%G5199><s%>

And for this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G1223><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> were persecuting <S%G1377><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> He was doing <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> on the Sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>
But He answered <S%G611><s%> them, "My Father <S%G3962><s%> is working <S%G2038><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> now, <S%G737><s%> and I Myself <S%G1473><s%> am working. <S%G2038><s%>"

For this <S%G3778><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> were seeking <S%G2212><s%> all the more <S%G3123><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> Him, because <S%G3754><s%> He not only <S%G3440><s%> was breaking <S%G3089><s%> the Sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> was calling <S%G3004><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> His own <S%G2398><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> making <S%G4160><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> equal <S%G2470><s%> with God. <S%G2316><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and was saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, the Son <S%G5207><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3762><s%> of Himself, <S%G1438><s%> unless <S%G302><s%> <S%G3361><s%> [it is] something <S%G5100><s%> He sees <S%G991><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> doing; <S%G4160><s%> for whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> [the Father] does, <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> does <S%G4160><s%> in like <S%G3668><s%> manner. <S%G3668><s%>

"For the Father <S%G3962><s%> loves <S%G5368><s%> the Son, <S%G5207><s%> and shows <S%G1166><s%> Him all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> that He Himself <S%G846><s%> is doing; <S%G4160><s%> and greater <S%G3173><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> than these <S%G3778><s%> will He show <S%G1166><s%> Him, that you may marvel. <S%G2296><s%>

"For just <S%G5618><s%> as the Father <S%G3962><s%> raises <S%G1453><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> and gives <S%G2227><s%> them life, <S%G2227><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> gives <S%G2227><s%> life <S%G2227><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> He wishes. <S%G2309><s%>
"For not even <S%G3761><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> judges <S%G2919><s%> anyone, <S%G3762><s%> but He has given <S%G1325><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> to the Son, <S%G5207><s%>

in order <S%G2443><s%> that all <S%G3956><s%> may honor <S%G5091><s%> the Son, <S%G5207><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as they honor <S%G5091><s%> the Father. <S%G3962><s%> He who does not honor <S%G5091><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> does not honor <S%G5091><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> who sent <S%G3992><s%> Him.

"Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, he who hears <S%G191><s%> My word, <S%G3056><s%> and believes <S%G4100><s%> Him who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me, has <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> and does not come <S%G2064><s%> into judgment, <S%G2920><s%> but has passed <S%G3327><s%> out of death <S%G2288><s%> into life. <S%G2222><s%>

"Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, an hour <S%G5610><s%> is coming <S%G2064><s%> and now <S%G3568><s%> is, when <S%G3753><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> shall hear <S%G191><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who hear <S%G191><s%> shall live. <S%G2198><s%>

"For just <S%G5618><s%> as the Father <S%G3962><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> in Himself, <S%G1438><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> He gave <S%G1325><s%> to the Son <S%G5207><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to have <S%G2192><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> in Himself; <S%G1438><s%>
and He gave <S%G1325><s%> Him authority <S%G1849><s%> to execute <S%G4160><s%> judgment, <S%G2920><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> He is [the] Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man. <S%G444><s%>

"Do not marvel <S%G2296><s%> at this; <S%G3778><s%> for an hour <S%G5610><s%> is coming, <S%G2064><s%> in which <S%G3739><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are in the tombs <S%G3419><s%> shall hear <S%G191><s%> His voice, <S%G5456><s%>

and shall come <S%G1607><s%> forth; <S%G1607><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who did <S%G4160><s%> the good <S%G18><s%> [deeds] to a resurrection <S%G386><s%> of life, <S%G2222><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who committed <S%G4238><s%> the evil <S%G5337><s%> [deeds] to a resurrection <S%G386><s%> of judgment. <S%G2920><s%>

"I can <S%G1410><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3762><s%> on My own <S%G1683><s%> initiative. <S%G1683><s%> As I hear, <S%G191><s%> I judge; <S%G2919><s%> and My judgment <S%G2920><s%> is just, <S%G1342><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I do not seek <S%G2212><s%> My own <S%G1699><s%> will, <S%G2307><s%> but the will <S%G2307><s%> of Him who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me.
"If <S%G1437><s%> I [alone] bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of Myself, <S%G1683><s%> My testimony <S%G3141><s%> is not true. <S%G227><s%>

"There is another <S%G243><s%> who bears <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of Me, and I know <S%G3609><s%> that the testimony <S%G3141><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> He bears <S%G3140><s%> of Me is true. <S%G227><s%>
"You have sent <S%G649><s%> to John, <S%G2491><s%> and he has borne <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> to the truth. <S%G225><s%>
"But the witness <S%G3141><s%> which I receive <S%G2983><s%> is not from man, <S%G444><s%> but I say <S%G3004><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> that you may be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

"He was the lamp <S%G3088><s%> that was burning <S%G2545><s%> and was shining <S%G5316><s%> and you were willing <S%G2309><s%> to rejoice <S%G21><s%> for a while <S%G5610><s%> in his light. <S%G5457><s%>

"But the witness <S%G3141><s%> which I have <S%G2192><s%> is greater <S%G3173><s%> than [that of] John; <S%G2491><s%> for the works <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> Me to accomplish, <S%G5048><s%> the very <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> that I do, <S%G4160><s%> bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of Me, that the Father <S%G3962><s%> has sent <S%G649><s%> Me.

"And the Father <S%G3962><s%> who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me, He has borne <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of Me. You have neither <S%G3777><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> His voice <S%G5456><s%> at any <S%G4455><s%> time, <S%G4455><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> seen <S%G3708><s%> His form. <S%G1491><s%>
"And you do not have <S%G2192><s%> His word <S%G3056><s%> abiding <S%G3306><s%> in you, for you do not believe <S%G4100><s%> Him whom <S%G3739><s%> He sent. <S%G649><s%>

"You search <S%G2045><s%> the Scriptures, <S%G1124><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you think <S%G1380><s%> that in them you have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life; <S%G2222><s%> and it is these <S%G1565><s%> that bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of Me;
and you are unwilling <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2309><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to Me, that you may have <S%G2192><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>
"I do not receive <S%G2983><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> from men; <S%G444><s%>
but I know <S%G1097><s%> you, that you do not have <S%G2192><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in yourselves. <S%G1438><s%>

"I have come <S%G2064><s%> in My Father's name, <S%G3686><s%> and you do not receive <S%G2983><s%> Me; if <S%G1437><s%> another <S%G243><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%> in his own <S%G2398><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> you will receive <S%G2983><s%> him.

"How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> you believe, <S%G4100><s%> when you receive <S%G2983><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> from one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> and you do not seek <S%G2212><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> that is from the [one and] only <S%G3441><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>?

"Do not think <S%G1380><s%> that I will accuse <S%G2723><s%> you before <S%G4314><s%> the Father; <S%G3962><s%> the one who accuses <S%G2723><s%> you is Moses, <S%G3475><s%> in whom <S%G3739><s%> you have set <S%G1679><s%> your hope. <S%G1679><s%>
"For if <S%G1487><s%> you believed <S%G4100><s%> Moses, <S%G3475><s%> you would believe <S%G4100><s%> Me; for he wrote <S%G1125><s%> of Me.
"But if <S%G1487><s%> you do not believe <S%G4100><s%> his writings, <S%G1121><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> will you believe <S%G4100><s%> My words <S%G4487><s%>?"
